name: Exorcism Express
description:
Premise:

Someone on the train is the vessel for a dangerous ghost!  Talk to the passengers to discover the identify of the ghost and exorcise it.  Guess wrong, however, and the passenger will be left as a soulless husk.

Credits:

A Global Game Jam 2015 project by Bryson Thill and Liz Fiacco.
Voice effects provided by Grayson Stone.

Music is Halloween Waltz LOOP by Smerkcircus.
Other sound effects from www.freesound.org:
Blood SFX by Rock Savage
Train Horn by eliasheuninck
Lightning by Littlebrojay

Mentions:

GameCrate - Best of GGJ2015
